          <title>
            <string language="en">Forces on a rolling ball</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kräfte auf einer Rollenkugel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Forces sur une boule de roulement</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Forças em uma esfera do rolling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forze su una sfera di rolling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δυνάμεις σε μια κυλώντας σφαίρα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerzas en una bola del balanceo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram identifies four forces acting on a rolling ball.  This can be used in a labelling exercise.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">action force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balanced forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Friction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction force</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm kennzeichnet vier Kräfte, die 
auf einer Rollenkugel fungieren. Dieses kann in einer 
beschriftenden Übung verwendet werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme identifie quatre forces agissant sur 
une boule de roulement. Ceci peut être utilisé dans un 
exercice étiquetant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama identifica quatro forças que agem 
em uma esfera do rolling. Isto pode ser usado em um exercício 
etiquetando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema identifica quattro forze che si 
comportano su una sfera di rolling. Ciò può essere usata in 
un'esercitazione identificante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα προσδιορίζει τέσσερις δυνάμεις 
ενεργώντας σε μια κυλώντας σφαίρα. Αυτό μπορεί να 
χρησιμοποιηθεί σε μια άσκηση μαρκαρίσματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama identifica cuatro fuerzas que 
actúan en una bola del balanceo. Esto se puede utilizar en un 
ejercicio de etiquetado.</string>
          </description>
